name: Hamlet
text: On Play: Play up to 1 Character card with the {SMILE} type and a cost of 2 or less from your trash.

effect.text: Play up to 1 Character card with the {SMILE} type and a cost of 2 or less from your trash.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has a '4000' power value with a 'Slash' attribute. The rarity is 'R' as printed in the bottom right corner.
